sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per encounter, the character may take a Valuable Facts action, making an Average (2 challenge dice purple d8) Knowledge check (the GM and player should determine which Knowledge skill is most applicable in the given situation). If successful, the character may add one triumph to any one check made by an allied character during the encounter.  The subsequent check should relate in some way to the facts the character learned, or the player should come up with an explanation for why the information the character learned is instrumental in the success of the ally's check.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Valuable Facts</name> <number>TAL0001152</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-07 22:28:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f7d87ec2db3ac4102901de90cf961907</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-07 22:28:22</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
